<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MobileThemeStyleValuePairs</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>MobileThemeStyleValuePairs</name> <script><![CDATA[function MobileThemeStyleValuePairs() { var styleGR = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_theme_style"); styleGR.query(); var defaultValue = []; while (styleGR.next()) { defaultValue.push('"' + styleGR.getValue('name') + '": ""'); }
return "{" + defaultValue.join(",") + "}"; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-09-17 19:25:54</sys_created_on> <sys_id>06f379c43b4000101a2d47e573efc473</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MobileThemeStyleValuePairs</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_06f379c43b4000101a2d47e573efc473</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-09-17 19:44:47</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>275</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
